## create() function

Creates a buffer containing an ID3 Tag and returns it via the callback.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function create(tags: WriteTags, callback: CreateCallback): void;
```

|  callback | [CreateCallback](./node-id3.createcallback.md) |  |

void
